subject: Sales
title: What Your Body Says Before You Speak
description: A fast breakdown of What Your Body Says Before You Speak for builders.

hook.text: A buyer forms a trust judgment within seven seconds. Your words haven't even started yet.

buildup.text: Body language accounts for up to 55% of communication impact. Posture speaks before words do.

discovery.text: Open palms signal honesty. Crossed arms suggest defensiveness. These cues are processed unconsciously.

twist.text: You can't fake body language for long. Forced smiles trigger suspicion faster than genuine frowns.

climax.text: The answer isn't acting. It's alignment. When your words match your body, trust forms automatically.

punchline.text: Your body talks before your mouth does. Align them.

quiz.question: How much of communication impact comes from body language?
